description:
In this course, I will show you and reveal magic tricks used by professional magicians like David Blaine. Learn card tricks for the beginners to the advanced, my whole course provides skills for whatever level that you are at. Embark on the journey with my to improve your sleight of hand and controls.

With just a pack of cards

* Create astounding effects

*Sleight of hand

*Card tricks that will confuse your spectator

You will need a pack of cards, hands, and an eager spirit

This course could take you 1-2 hours but maybe more if you are efficient at practicing.

You should take this course because on most of the magic stores all you get is one measly trick, but in this course you will get over 15 tricks!
title: Learn Magic to Amaze Everyone
